Package org.hypermedea.op.http

package org.hypermedea.op.http
HTTP binding, supporting all operation types except WATCH.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.hypermedea.op
    Protocol binding package, with common interface and base implementations.
    org.hypermedea.op.file
    File binding, with support for GET, PUT, POST and DELETE (read, write, append and delete).
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    HttpBinding
    Default HTTP binding.
    HttpOperation
    Wrapper for constructing and executing an HTTP request based on a given ThingDescription.
    HttpResponse
    Wrapper for an HTTP response received when performing a HttpOperation.
